title: Ticket #33: The "-xml" commad line option does not produce valid XML
description:
(copy of drupal node 1645)

Brian Bockelman reports that the OSG GIP pluggin for condor chokes when condor_status -submitters -xml returns a single blank line rather than a valid XML document. This happens when there are no submitters.

The problematic code is in PrettyPrint.C. The XML document header and footer are printed inside the function printXML(ad,...), so if no ads are printed, the header and footer are not printed.

Unless someone defends the current behavior, I propose that the header and footer should always be printed, regardless of whether there are any matching records or not.
